message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product.  After reviewing the value it brings, I'm initially offering it at $2,000,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. My counteroffer would be $1,800,000.
Bob, I appreciate you coming back with a counter offer.  While the product is extremely valuable at the original price, I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000 to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. My counteroffer would be $1,550,000.
